BALAPATABEDI - D.A. - Retired Chief Post Master - Panadura. Beloved husband of Mangalika, loving father of Ruchira, loving son of late Arnolis Silva and Seeli Jayasuriya, brother of late Suguna, Leelasena and Yasa, brother-in-law of Pali Cooray, expired. Remains lie at Mahinda Funeral Parlour, Gorakana, Panadura. Funeral on Monday 20th February 2017. 0715459271.023635

DE SILVA - HEMA - (Retired Teacher) of Poramba, Ambalangoda. Wife of late D.A. Mahindaratna (formerly of Ceylon Cold Stores), beloved mother of Anura Dedigamuwa (Retired Principal), Tilak (USA), Upul (Hirdaramani), Geeta (Canada), Saman and late Shyamalee, mother-in-law of Iranganie (Retired Teacher), Shivanthi (USA), Kumari (BOI), Kusum Lokuliyana (Canada), Lanka (SPC), passed away peacefully. Cortege leaves residence at 5.00 p.m. on (Monday) the 20th February, 2017, for cremation at Thalawathugoda Crematorium. 282A, Lumbini Place, Hokandara Road, Thalawathugoda. 077-7530989.023638

DE SILVA - WALTER THOMAS - Dearly beloved husband of Bessie, loving father of Pradeep (Australia), Dilukshi (Central Finance) & Sanjeewa (NTB), beloved father-in-law of Shalini (Australia), Nalin (Abans) & Dinali, expired. Cortege leaves Jayaratne Funeral Parlour for burial at General Cemetery, Kanatta (RC Section) at 5.00 p.m. on Monday 20th. No flowers please.023640

KAILASAPILLAI - V (KAILAS) (Retired Deputy Chairman, John Keells Holdings PLC). Beloved husband of Abirami (Kamala), loving father of Aravinthan and Arunthathi, father-in-law of Yaso and Siva Selliah, brother of Dr. V. Ambalavanar, precious grandmother of Ashwin, Suhasini and Guhan, brother-in-law of Sivakami, Mrs. Ammaiappar (Vadaku Veedu), Mankayatkarasi, Sangarapillai, Kumarasamy and Sivamalar. Remains lie at 24 Deal Place ‘A’ Colombo 03. Cortege leaves residence at 10.45 a.m. on Tuesday 21st for cremation at 11.30 a.m. at General Cemetery, Kanatte (Hindu Section). Entrance through main gate023642

MENDIS - B.D. BANDUSIRI - (CYRIL MENDIS). Retired Head Guard, Sri Lanka Railway Department. Beloved husband of Laskhmi, loving father of Mahesh and Ramesh, loving father-in-law of Vishaka and Amalika, passed away peacefully. Cortege leaves residence 39, Hill Street, Dehiwala. Cremation at Mt. Lavinia Cemetery at 5.00 p.m. on 20/2/2017.023634

PEIRIS - KENNETH (BUDGIE) - Beloved husband of Premanie Peiris (Ex Unilver, Sri Lanka), father of Samanthi Somaweera (Travel Arcade), Aruni Peiris (American Center, Colombo) & Senaka Peiris (Ceat Sri Lanka), father-in-law of late Gingi Somaweera, Lashan Senevirathne (businessman) & Julianne Perera (Lyceum Wattala), brother of Ronnie Peiris & Erland Peiris, loving grandfather of Shevanka, Shenal, Imanka, Inuk & Arith. Cortege leaves residence 57/16, Nimala Maria Mawatha, Hendala, Wattala for burial at Baptist Church, Kerawalapitiya on Monday 20th February 2017 at 3.30 p.m.023639

SENEVIRATNE - BERNEDETTE FLORISON (nee FERNANDO) BERNEI. Beloved wife of late Victor, loving mother of Srimalie, Jayanthi, Pauline, Rohan and Romaine, sister of Rex Fernando and late Eva, Clarence, Danister, Wally and Eunice, mother-in-law of Merril, Rohan and Nilanthi, darling Granny of Niroshini, Gihan, Ashanthi, Dinesha, Neleke, Ruwan, Gayani, Thushara, Shanaka, Gayan and Rochelle. Cortege leaves the residence No. 112, St. Mary’s Road, Mattakkuliya, Colombo 15 on Monday 20th February 2017 at 4.00 p.m. for burial at the Madampitiya Cemetery.023641
